name: Geek Free Web Design
tagline: New Zealand Web Design/ Web Dev
description: Geek Free are a team of professional New Zealand web developers, web designers, graphic designers, and internet marketers who help business owners achieve big results on the web in an affordable, effective way without stressing you out. Unlike many web design companies Geek Free was born out of the necessity to find a simple solution to getting on the web without having to go through the pain of dealing with geeks and people who actually knew little to nothing about marketing.
